  [3m[38;5;246m2. The session duration is longer than 20 seconds (20000ms)[39m[23m

  [3m[38;5;246mThis means that if Claude Code sessions are completing in less than 20 [39m[23m

  [3m[38;5;246mPerfect! Now I can see exactly how the completion alert system works. The [39m[23m
  [3m[38;5;246msound alert is triggered on the [38;5;153mclaude:sessionComplete[38;5;246m event, but only if:[39m[23m

  [3m[38;5;246m1. [38;5;153maudioAlertsEnabled[38;5;246m is true[39m[23m
  [3m[38;5;246m2. The session duration is longer than 20 seconds (20000ms)[39m[23m

  [3m[38;5;246mThis means that if Claude Code sessions are completing in less than 20 [39m[23m
  [3m[38;5;246mseconds, no sound will play. Also, the user might have audio alerts disabled.[39m[23m

  [3m[38;5;246mLet me now check where [38;5;153maudioAlertsEnabled[38;5;246m is set from, which should be from [39m[23m
